reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.reviews: Great lecturer with deep knowledge. Makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.reviews: Very clear explanations, but sometimes moves too fast through material.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.reviews: The lectures are informative but can be a bit dry. Overall a good professor.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.reviews: Engaging and always willing to help. Labs are well organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject and makes history come alive!

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.reviews: Lectures are hard to follow and not very interactive. Needs improvement.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.reviews: Very knowledgeable and encourages discussion. Sometimes a bit tough on grading.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.reviews: Decent lectures, but often goes off-topic. Could be more focused.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.reviews: Excellent at explaining economic concepts with real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.reviews: Engaging and insightful. Encourages critical thinking and debate.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.reviews: Interesting lectures but assignments are vague. Needs clearer guidelines.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.reviews: Very supportive and understanding. Makes learning enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about art and very knowledgeable. Lectures are engaging.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.reviews: The content is good, but the delivery can be monotonous at times.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.reviews: Incredibly passionate and knowledgeable. Inspires students to care about the environment.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.reviews: Great at explaining complex theories. Encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.reviews: Good professor, but sometimes hard to follow during lectures.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.reviews: Amazing at making difficult concepts easy to understand. Very patient.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.reviews: Very knowledgeable and uses great examples. Can be a bit strict with deadlines.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.reviews: Incredible professor with a deep understanding of the subject. Highly recommended!
